4 
5 double correctYawAngle(const double theta, const double increment) {
6  double yaw = 0;
7  double angle = theta + increment;
8  if (angle > 180.0) {
9  yaw = -180.0 - (180.0 - angle);
10  } else if (angle < -180.0) {
11  yaw = 180.0 - (-180.0 - angle);
12  } else {
13  yaw = angle;
14  }
15  return yaw;
16 }
17 
18 const int sgn(const int x) {
19  return (x > 0) ? 1 : (x < 0) ? -1 : 0;
20 }
21 
22 double degToRad(double angle){
23  return angle/180.0*CV_PI;
24 }
25 
26 double radToDeg(double angle){
27  return angle/CV_PI*180.0;
28 }

47 const rs::rangeArray_ptr RangeSensor::getLaserScan(const cv::Point sensorPos, const double theta) const {
48  //yaw needs to be shifted by -90deg because robot people put their yaw=0 on the positive x-axis
49  //double yaw = rs::correctYawAngle(theta, -90);
50  //yaw = theta;
51  //get sensor configuration
52  double FOV, resolution, range;
53  int obstacleColor;
54  if(type == laser) {
55  FOV = config.laser_field_of_view;
56  range = config.laser_max_sensor_distance+0.5;
57  resolution = config.laser_angular_resolution;
58  obstacleColor = config.laser_obstacle_color;
59  }else{
60  FOV = config.us_field_of_view;
61  range = config.us_max_sensor_distance+0.5;
62  resolution = config.us_angular_resolution;
63  obstacleColor = config.us_obstacle_color;
64  }
65 
66  //init loop for iteratiting over n-angles
67  int nAngles = FOV / resolution;
68  std::vector<float> rangeArray = std::vector<float>(nAngles);
69  double angle = rs::correctYawAngle(theta, -FOV / 2);
70  double maxDistance = range/mapInfo.resolution;
71 
72  for (int a = 0; a < nAngles; a++) {
73  cv::Point P2;
74 
75  P2.x = (int) round(
76  sensorPos.x
77  + maxDistance * std::cos((-angle) * CV_PI / 180.0)); // - vor angle entfernt
78  P2.y = (int) round(
79  sensorPos.y
80  + maxDistance * std::sin((-angle) * CV_PI / 180.0)); // - vor angle entfernt
81 
82  cv::LineIterator it(map, sensorPos, P2, 8);
83  cv::Point currentPos = it.pos();
84  for (int i = 0; i < it.count; i++, ++it) {
85  currentPos = it.pos();
86  if (map.at<uchar>(currentPos) == obstacleColor) {
87  break;
88  }
89  }
90  double scannedRange = cv::norm(sensorPos-currentPos)*mapInfo.resolution;
91  rangeArray[a]=scannedRange;
92  angle = rs::correctYawAngle(angle, resolution);
93  }
94  return std::make_shared<std::vector<float> >(rangeArray);
95 }
96 const double RangeSensor::getUSScan(const cv::Point sensorPos, const double theta) const{
97  std::vector<float> rangeArray = *getLaserScan(sensorPos, theta);
98  double minOfRange = rangeArray[0];
99  for(auto current : rangeArray) {
100  if(current < minOfRange) {
101  minOfRange = current;
102  }
103  }
104  return minOfRange;
105 }
